{"id":1055378834,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1695297587,"status":12,"status_display":"Memory Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1055378834/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        if(p.size() == 0 && s.size() == 0)\n            return true;\n        else if(s.size() == 0) {\n            if(p[0] == '*') {\n                return isMatch(s, p.substr(1, p.size()-1));\n            } else {\n                return false;\n            }\n        } else if(p.size() == 0){\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        if(s[0] == p[0] || p[0] == '?') {\n            return isMatch(s.substr(1, s.size()-1), p.substr(1, p.size()-1));\n        } else if(p[0] == '*') {\n            if(p.size() > 1 && p[1] == '*') {\n                return isMatch(s, p.substr(1, p.size()-1));\n            } else {\n                return (\n                    isMatch(s.substr(1, s.size()-1), p) ||\n                    isMatch(s.substr(1, s.size()-1), p.substr(1, p.size()-1)) ||\n                    isMatch(s, p.substr(1, p.size()-1))\n                );\n            }\n        } else {\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
